message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $85. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we meet at $87.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $86?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $87, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to do $84?
